name: Nyxmas meetup
description:
It's Nyxmas! And there's an event going on! Go and see some people, maybe you'll make some friends.

(I am realising all the dialogue I did for this game is about christmas and not nyxmas oops, just consider this a very drastic typo).

Controls:

Space bar - continue dialogue (if you walk around before finishing some dialogue, you may get a bug!)
Arrow keys / wasd - move
Escape - quit game

Credits

Finished as part of the SGaP General Art Project
Song used: Nyxmas carol - SGaP and Pasteur
Font used: Neucha

Game made with unity, aseprite & sfxr

Oh edit! I feel like it'll really frustrating for people if I don't add this so, for clarification, on top of the introduction and ending, there are 6 other little moments in the game (along with any you make for yourself of course!). If you're stuck and want to find them all, add a comment and I'll say where they are
